lead_paragraph: Nishikori made his way into the Barcelona Open semifinals in Spain by holding off Roberto Bautista Agut, 6-2, 3-6, 6-1.

headline.print_headline: Nishikori and Ferrer Advance in Barcelona
headline.main: Kei Nishikori and David Ferrer Advance in Barcelona

snippet: Nishikori made his way into the Barcelona Open semifinals in Spain by holding off Roberto Bautista Agut, 6-2, 3-6, 6-1.
abstract: Kei Nishikori beats Roberto Bautista Agut in Barcelona Open men's quarterfinals; other tennis news noted.
